Uses of Package
org.ops4j.peaberry

Packages that use org.ops4j.peaberry
org.ops4j.peaberry peaberry - dynamic service extension for Google-Guice. 
org.ops4j.peaberry.builders Fluent APIs for importing and exporting dynamic services. 
org.ops4j.peaberry.util Optional helper methods. 
 

Classes in org.ops4j.peaberry used by org.ops4j.peaberry
AttributeFilter
          Service attribute filter.
Export
          Handle to a service instance exported in a ServiceScope.
Import
          Handle to a service instance imported from a ServiceRegistry.
ServiceException
          General purpose service exception.
ServiceRegistry
          Simple abstraction of a dynamic service registry.
ServiceScope
          A write-only collection of exported services with associated attributes.
